Side Effects: Exhaustion_ nausea_ muscle ache_ loss of appetite_ disorientation and poor sleep.Use with caution
none
Comments: worked within 3 hours to abate excruciating pain of the UTI.

Side Effects: I was prescribed this drug by my urologist back in the early 1980's.  After taking two doses_ became severely ill with flu-like symptoms.  Vomiting for five days_ body aches_ 102 fever_ tremors_ weakness_ diarrhea and headache.  I have never bee so ill in my life.  Had to crawl to the bathroom on hands and knees.  I actually thought I was going to die from this drug.  Macrodantin is a serious drug. Use with extreme caution.
Comments: Avoid taking if possible.  I do not recommend it.

Side Effects: Extreme vomiting for 3 days and no appetite for 5 days  So very sick and only took 2 tabs please be very careful with  this tablet Have informed my G P so I will not be prescribed this again
Extreme vomiting for 3 days and no appetite for 5 days  So very sick and only took 2 tabs please be very careful with  this tablet Have informed my G P so I will not be prescribed this again
Very achy especially my back and legs.  Tired and no ambition at all.....flu like symptoms
Nausea and dizziness . It feels as if my head is spinning . Now I take it at night .it works very well.looking at my urine in the morning something is coming out .

Strangely foggy head. At work was toLd I was 'spaced out' and I felt unable to get in touch with reality_ disorientated - not in a nice way! Very scary feeling. Only took two doses but the effect lasted five days.
Only a bit of coughing and some flue like symptoms runny nose
Comments: It's a antibacterial antibiotic which only works in bladder and kidneys had ongoing infections leaving my left kidney damaged for 10 years due to lower back problems from L2 to S1 was histerical cause all tests did not reveal any problem my symptoms was treated iso fhe cause since I had my back surgery  all my urinary and intestine problem was sorted_ macrodantin was and still is my life saver always keep some in my handbag.usually nfections hit me when it holidays or over weekends when all outlets and dr_'s are closed

Side Effects: Permanent scarring of the lungs. Can only walk a few steps and then give out of breath. This lung disease is permanent and I am now on prednisone
Comments: A friend if mine also has the same lung disease caused by this antibiotic. She is now permanently on oxygen for the rest of her life.

Side Effects: All that have been mentioned. Exhaustion_ aching_ nausea_ tingling_ cramps_ head throbbing_ hands swelling
Comments: Dreadful medication to take. Exercise caution. Cannot recall exact dosage as only just found this forum but am still suffering since July 2013. Only took for 2 days

Side Effects: Severe headache_ hot and shivering_ loss of appetite_ stopped taking them after 5 doses
Comments: Quite scary would not recommend taking it.

Side Effects: Chills and fever_ headaches_ elevated heart rate_ muscular aches throughout body_ extreme fatigue. Am a Personal Trainer & athlete but am exhausted by simple tasks like sweeping_ showering_ etc.

Nausea_ runny tummy_ tiredness after 3 weeks of treatment - supposed to take for 6 months. Stopped taking them 3 days ago and no better. Infection dormant for now. That's it for me_ no more the pharmacist took them back. Still feeling sick.

Reason: UTI that has lasted a year!
Side Effects: I have been on these tablets for 3 months . I have to say they have kept the UTI away (unless I come off them) and to stay with I had no side effects. Couldn't see what all the fuss was. After 3 months I can stand no more. I honestly feel like I'm dying. I never get headaches but I feel like someone is trying to blown my brain up. My ears hurt_ my chest hurts_ I have gone from 12k runs to not being able to walk up the stairs. I have hot and cold flushes_ panic attacks and dizzy spells. The first GP I spoke to said it was nothing to do with the Macrodantin. The second one said it was. I KNOW it is. Evil stuff.

I was prescribed macrodantin after having numerous bladder i fections even after taking other antibotics I would still get bladder infection over and over. My urologist put me on macrodantin now being chronic as ive been on this for 8 months now (1 tablet at night) and i still have another 5months to go afterwhich i propably need to go for a followup. Obly side effects ive had is a bit of bloating and tiredness. But other than that it really works. I dont get bladder infections anymore. However reading all the conplaints i am a bit concerned about any side effects which eventually might surface because of the prolonged use of this medication. And maybe by then the side effects are irreversable. So yes the medication works for me but i am concerned for possible underlining side effects. But i havent had "liver failure" yet being on this for 8months already so i guess ill be fine.

Sudden onset of fever_ chills_ uncontrollable shivering with high temperature and sore skin after 3 tablets. Another 2 tablets later and severe drowsiness_ nausea and feeling faint if in any position other than horizontal for more than 5 minutes. No appetite_ Severe drenching night sweats. Abandoned tablets after taking only 1.5 days worth of 7 day dose. Very shaky still day after stopped taking them.
Comments: Did remove uti pain v quickly but side effects worse than uti pain! Scary. Not felt so ill in a very long time. Would not touch these again.

Side Effects: Tiredness in afternoons and suppressed appetite
Comments: Took for 7 weeks post bladder surgery 2x a day at 100mg. Sorry that some had bad side effects but I think it's individual. Other antibiotics didn't touch the infection whereas these did. I had raised temperature and back pain but I put this down to the infection I actually had to start with. Would recommend for severe infection

Side Effects: DO NOT TAKE THIS!!!!  I was prescribed a 7 day course of this drug for a severe UTI. 1 tablet made me tired and nauseous but I decided to soldier on to get rid of the infection. By the second day I was very ill. Nauseous_ dizzy_ overwhemingly lethargic_ dry mouth_ temperature_ hot and cold sweats.. The list goes on. It was HORRIBLE. I was very scared. I would NEVER take this again.
Comments: Now I've read these reviews I wonder why on earth this drug is allowed to be prescribed?! I wish I was never given it. PLEASE stay away.

Side Effects: Extreme diarrhoea (totally watery) and vomiting_ severe stomach cramps_ temperature of 38.5_ aching joints_ headaches_ constant nausea. Stopped taking drugs but diarrhoea and cramps have persisted for two days now. Feel very nervous that I have damaged my system in some way.
Comments: I was not warned by my doctor or pharmacist about possible side effects. I would having stopped taking these ghastly drugs much sooner had I known. I would never ever touch this stuff again.

Side Effects: Chills_ nausea_ chest pain_ leg pain_ extreme fatigue_ malaise_ anxiety and depression
Comments: This was worse than the flu.  I would never_ ever take this drug again.  I was bedridden for days.  Couldn't see through the fog.

Side Effects: Iam on day 5 of taking these tablets and has so far just experienced slight tiredness in the afternoons_ I have had NO other side effects what so ever_ after reading these reviews I was scared to death_ and after taking the third tablet my symptoms of UTI started to clear up and I've had no symptoms since_ not everybody will experience these side effects listed and so pleased with results and would take again if had to
Blinding headaches . Fever. Cold sweats. Sore throat . Feeling really unwell. Have gastric reflux so had really bad indigestion and chest pains.
Comments: Would never use again waiting for gp to open to change medication.

Side Effects: NONE Other than TIREDNESS and usual thrush reaction
Comments: WORKED REALLY WELLBetter after 1 tablet

Side Effects: Difficulties to breath_ dry cough_ fatigue. I hope it did not cause permanent damage to my lungs_ feeling really breathless. I had to stop taking it. Why doctors keep prescribing such a dangerous medicine when there are safer alternatives?

Nausea_ dry mouth fatigue_ weakness_ drowsiness_ blurred vision_ headache_ loss of appetite_ loose_ pale stools_ severe itchiness_ coughing_ liver damage with some readings eleven times the normal range
Comments: Three weeks after stopping the drug_ having been given a different antibiotic I began to feel better but liver is not 100% better and I am still not back to full energy levels

Side Effects: eased the pain from the UTI within hours

Felt so ill! Sickness_ hot flushes _ flu like symptoms_ tight chest (I have asthma) breathing difficulties. Felt worse after taking this medication. If you have any acid reflux problems I would stay away..it really upset my stomach.

have gradually felt worse on these ..overwhelming nausea  feeling lethargic ..abdomunal pain and leg n groin pain ..urinating constantley   very dry mouth  and feelung so unwell..rang drs and told to stop taking  ..never agian would i take this .

Pressure headache_ dizziness_ fatigue_pains in hands and joints_ nausea. Eventually culminated with severe uncontrollable shivering and muscle spasms_vomiting and loose stools_ blotchy rash on legs.Spasms faded after  about 3 hours leaving me feeling very weak_ bruised. The first time in 25 years of marriage my husband has had to look after me. It is now two days later and I am still not recovered fully (although the UTI has cleared!) I was very frightened by what happened_ and will not use this medication again.
Comments: This medication was prescribed after another antibiotic had failed to clear the UTI.

Side Effects: Ended up in A&E after taking one tablet. Scary
Just took my first one after reading all these comments in a tad worried now :( hopefully it will sort this pain out and soon
dry weird tasting mouth but feel like i'm on a super high :-)first day brought out the pain but these are the first antibiotics that haven't upset my stomach :-)

I WAS GIVEN THIS MEDICATION AT A/E AS HAD BEEN BLEEDING WITH BAD UTI INFECTION CAME BACK 2 WEEKS LATER AND WAS GIVEN AGAIN ENDED UP CALLING AMBULANCE AS I PASSED OUT GOING TO THE BATHROOM AFTER 3 DOSES SICK CHILLS BLOOD PRESSURE WAS VERY VERY LOW AND I HAD PROBLEMS WITH HEART WHEN BLOODS DONE AT HOSPITAL FOUND RAISED LEVELS OF LIVER DAMAGE? DOCTORS DIDNT ONCE SAY IT WAS THE MEDICATION JUST GAVE ME IV OF DIFFERENT ANTIBOTICS THOUGHT IT WAS THE INFECTION GOING SEPTIC. ONE WEEK LATER AND HOME FEELING MUCH BETTER MY OWN DOCTOR SAID I SHOULD TAKE MACRODANTIN 100MG AT NIGHT RAISED MY CONCERNS WITH HER THAT I DIDNT THINK IT SUITED ME BUT TOOK I TABLET LAST NIGHT THIS MORNING FELT SICK SHAKEY AND REALLY BAD HEADACHE NEARLY PASSED OUT AGAIN IN BATHROOM LOOKED UP THE SIDE EFFECTS OF THIS DRUG AND REALISED THIS IS WHY THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH MY LIVER!! WILL NEVER TAKE AGAIN AND HOPE WHEN BLOODS TAKEN IN 2 MONTHS TIME MY LIVER IS OK CANT BELIEVE DOCTORS IN HOSPITAL DIDNT PICKUP ON THIS I HAVE HAD

Upset stomach_ joint pains_ extreme tiredness and generally feeling unwell by the afternoon.  Nausea feeling increases as the day went on_ flashing lights (distorted vision). Chest pains. I feel scared taking these tablets and hope that the benefits outweigh the reactions. One more day to go.   I would not like to take this antibiotic again.

Constant headache_ tiredness_ anxiety/mood swings_ constantly feel bloated_  sore all over_ sleep half the day away_ foggy thinking_ cannot stay focused or think_  no appetite_ neck ache_ eyes ache.  Can't accomplish anything. Feel horrible.
Comments: Started with 100mg 4x a day for 4 doses. Then began 50mg 4x a day for 9 days.

Side Effects: Dreadful stomach crampsand that has lasted for 2 daysand I only took 1 tabletwould not take them again

Reason: mum taking it to prevent further UT
Side Effects: Elderly mother with possible liver/lung problem too... got rash _ burning palms_ sever itch over whole body_ blue skin and nails_ diarrhea_ blurred vision_ confusion/delerium_ mood change_ persistently felt unwell_ red swollen cellulitic legs_ stomach discomfort_ dark urine_ tingling and numbness in feet_ tired/weak.
Comments: Neither the doctors (oncologist or GP) or pharmacist warned us of this and even when we highlighted symptoms  to them_ said nothing about these side effcets. Definitely would never ever use it again.

Side Effects: My mum had only two doses and became very poorly overnight. Couldn't put one foot in front of the other. Her mental ability waa impaired_ she could't understand simple instructions and was as yellow as a split pea. We stopped medication immediately and it was 24hrs before she felt better. Never again......
Headaches_extreme nausea and vomiting
Nothing apart from feeling really spaced out and happy. Can I stay on them please??;-)
Comments: Never had this medication before so googled it and found this site. After reading the awful experiences that people have had on here I nearly didn't start to take them. I was horrified. How ever_ glad I did because all that has happened is I feel really spaced out_ a bit like I've been drinking. Think they knocked me out because I had the best nights sleep for a long time. Woke up this morning feeling amazing_ after feeling rotten for weeks. Only had 3 tablets but I feel like a new woman!! Only down side is I'm not sure I'd be safe to drive feeling like this.

Side Effects: Dreadful dry mouth. I could hardly talk my lips and mouth were so dry_ like I'd been in the desert for week with no water. Also had a sore throat_ and sniffles. Stopped taking them.

Third day took one in morning and within 20 minutes I started a dry persistent cough and then had difficultly breathing_ tight chest and pains and felt very unwell. Spent 6 hours at GP clinic. It is now on my banned list of antibiotics
Fatigue_ loss of appetite
Severe breathlessness and chest pain.
Comments: My GP told me to stop them immediately.
Do not take this drug.  Beware of side effects in many people.  Topix.com has much more info.  Search this drug and you may be shocked

Side Effects: Awful side effects - wheezing_ shortness of breath_ racing heart_ nausea and feeling faint. A little research showed a scary link to lung difficulties and respritory failure. Would never recommend this drug to anyone_ it can have very dangerous side effects.
No side effects whatsoever
Nausea_ weakness_ lethargy_ lightheadedness_ extreme fatigue_ body pains_ flu like symptoms.  I was barely functional.   Within a couple of days of stopping this medication the symptoms disappeared.

Mild headache_ stomach cramps_ mild pain behind eyes_ mild aching in arms. Most surprising was a euphoric 'high'_ was in extremely good mood_ I'm told this is unusual for Macrodantin but it made the other side effects easy to accept.
Comments: It sorted out the UTI quickly and effectively.

Side Effects: No side effects. It seems to have worked extremely well and quickly_ thank goodness.

Fuzzy head_ headache_ dry mouth_ sore throat_ aching joints_ strange "bruised" feeling everywhere_ palpitations  and EXTREME lethergy/tiredness. The drug has seemed to aleviate the symptoms of the infection but I feel absolutely horrendous. I'm not taking anymore and going straight back to the docs tomorrow. Feel like I'm drunk and in pain all over! I dread to think what it has done to my system to cause this reaction. I have arrithmia and can't believe I was prescribed this drug!
nausea and headache
Comments: took tablets with milk duering meals but made no differance had to stop taking them

Side Effects: As I was suffering fever from the UTI when I began the drug I didn't notice any side effects but by day 2 although the pain from the UTI had gone I started to feel very nauseous with constant dull headache_ I felt I had no energy and was very tired all the time with no appetite.   Now feel generally unwell and depressed and have decided to stop taking Macrodantin after 4 days instead of 7.

Took 2 tablets the first day as I got it late in the day and felt some side effects like pains in my back and mouth_ throat areas.Next morning uti felt better but was very anxious which carried on through the day plus really bad pain and trapped wind. Palpitations a lot and other pains in body which took my breath away they hurt that much. Seriously considering not taking it tomorrow if no UTI pain as i hate this medicine and it scares me. Suppose to take it for 7 days.
Comments: I had blood in my urine and tried lots of natural ways as I prefer them but just couldn't seem to shift it hence the antibiotics but its too hard to carry on.

Side Effects: Been taken it for 2 days _ pressure on chest_ throat seams to be swollen_ terrible back pain_ constant urination_ nausea_ bad smelling urine_ just hope these get rid of infection as ive had every other anti biotics! :-(
first couple of doses I experienced back pain_ but after continuing with my medication it has helped me significantly_ no serious or noticeable side affects.

Currently taking macrodantin for a UTI! Feel awful:-NauseaVomitingLoss of appetiteBack painAbdo painNight sweats and fever like symptomsGroin painHeadachesSensitive skinGenerally feeling very unwell_ going to stop with immediate effect!!

Only take as a maintenance dose to prevent recurring uti's. First dose_ severe abdominal pain_ worse than labor pains. Didn't equate to this_ but connected the dots after next experience. Second dose...Scariest night of my life!! Swollen tongue and lips_ difficulty swallowing and speaking_tingling and numbness in hands_ sweats_ racing heart_ weakness. Rushed to hospital with allergic reaction and given Benadryl. Took 2 days for swelling in tongue to completely go away. Wish i had seen this site before taking this...definitely not an appropriate medicine to take for preventative use.

I am already anemic and the drug does say be careful if youre anaemic_ but my chest is so so heavy i cant even talk_ im tired i cant eat where ifeel so bloated and full up!! i WISH it gave me an upset stomach i feel so huge!
Took the first capsule an hour and a half ago and feeling shaky_ back pain is 10x worse_ severe stomach pain.
Comments: Not looking forward to taking the rest of the course.

Side Effects: muscle weakness and aching....joints aching...felt like flu symptoms...only worse!...migraines...fatigue...abdominal pain...acid reflux...had to go to the ER for continued symptoms...my liver enzymes were very elevated and out of whack...have liver toxicity/drug induced hepatitis from this medication!....the uti is gone however...but the havoc that is has wreaked on the rest of my system has not been worth it!!...i am having to do a liver detox now as a result of this medication....very displeased!...i just hope that irreparable damage has not been done to my liver
Frequent visits to the bathroom_ right side pain_ lower back pain_ feeling weak_ sleepless nights_ coloured urine (this is normal)_ loss of appetite and not wanting to eat. No nausea
Comments: Visited doc with 2 days left to go on Macrodantin. Didn't seem worried and said that the tablet changes the way your gut works and to leave a week after taking the tablet to see if side effects settle down_ if not to visit again. Have to take a urine sample after 1 week of finishing tablets to confirm the infection has cleared

Side Effects: I didnt get any side effects with this drug
I've quite severe UTI with bloody urine. After 4 capsules_ the pain almost completely gone. About to take my 8th capsule.  Drowsy and diarrhea are the only side effects so far. But it's fairly mild.

Have so far experienced muscles stiffening_ numbness/tingling as well as feeling physically weaker in arms and legs. These are listed as side effects but not as common ones...not sure if its worth seeing the docs again
Comments: Can tell it's working straight away - many symptoms of the persistent UTI have disappeared.

Side Effects: Extreme shortness of breath_ wheezing and coughing after just 5 tablets
Comments: I stopped taking the tablets as soon as the breathing difficulties started.  I recovered in a couple of days thereafter. I wouldn't take the medication again and am trying unsweetened 100% cranberry juice now.

Side Effects: Nausea_ lower back pain_ and tiredness_
Comments: Taking this medication seemed to exacerbate the symptoms of my UTI .  I had more frequent runs to the bathroom. The lower back pain increased more while taking this medication.  This medication was not for me.

Side Effects: Urinated a lot more.Gave me thrush
Severe HeadacheAching legs and ArmsWeaknessSickness and NauseaDry MouthBad taste in mouthLack of appititeCold shiversGlands up in neckSore ThroatGeneral feeling of being very unwell
Comments: Do NOT take this drugIt makes you ILL...very ILL

Side Effects: After taking for five days developed pain in right side that would travel from my spine like an internal hot liquid all over my chest and down my arms which in turn made me feel anxious and panicky. It happened every evening after that until I finished the course and gradually was less intense but four days after finishing still have this but to a much lesser degree. Also had burning pain all down my spine & burning sensation also in my feet. I must stress I was also on another tablet at the same time but reading these reviews on this forum I think this tablet may have caused the symptoms. Also left me feeling anxious.
Comments: Cleared the uti

Side Effects: First day very mild tiredness_ felf a bit hot flush.But UTI's also makes me feel very tired and with fever.
Comments: I get reacurrent UTI's very often and when the doctor prescribe this I was a bit concerned because i never had them before.The colour of my urine changed to bright yellow i think is to do with the pill shell_by the 3rd day all UTI symptoms  were gone but i carried on taking till 7th day to make sure i finish the course.Know pain free. Yes i would take again.

Side Effects: No bad side effects whatsoever. The symptoms of the uti cleared up after three tablets and I had to take four 50MG tablets per day. I am writing this review because of all the negative reviews here. Some people do have adverse reactions to certain drugs but that does not mean everyone will. Don't be frightened by all you read here. Try it for yourself. It worked great for me and I would use it again if needed.
Felt I was dying. Head one side numb couldn't walk unaided_ chest tight - felt horrendous. Am so worried that any damage already sustained is irreversible.
Comments: Never ever take this terrible pill.

Side Effects: violent headache_ fever_ joint pain hacking cough which doctor thought was chest infection but wasnt_ weakness in legs_ doctor was goin 2 keep me on tablets but refused_ trying a different antibiotic an just hope i feel better soon

Horrendous coughing every night for over a week now to the point i feel like i have cracked all my ribs because i am coughing so hard.i stopped taking them 3 days ago but the cough hasnt eased and now i am itching all over especially my feet. It has cleared the uti but i would rather get up 5 times a night for the toilet than experience the side effects of this drug.should not be prescribed
Tiredness_ nausea_ itching_ mood swings_ bloated_ feeling of being full after not eating much_ no appetite really -  eating because I know I have to_ not because I feel hungry.
Comments: So far taking for 3 days but duration of treatment is 10 days.

Side Effects: Only side effects have been chest tightness_ doctor suggested ceasing use immediately.

Nausea_ sickness_ extreme weakness_ lack of strength in legs_ headache_ breathlessness. These developed after my first course of the drug and it was thought I had a chest infection. On taking again_ however_ symptoms appeared after third tablet. I was in bed for four days after first course and for two days after te second_ but was very weak and breathless with a cough for around ten days each time. I was so weak that I could not push the duvet back when in bed.
Comments: Can't believe it could have passed trials with these awful side effects. My. doctor said I must never take it again. Lost in total most of December and half of January before I could leave house.

Side Effects: I have noticed that I am extremely tired now and put it down to my lifestyle and the stress. I have increased my supplementation to gve me increased energy but noticed that it isn't increasing my energy levels as they used to. So_ I began to look at my eating habits which then pointed to the Macrodantin which I take at night. I read the sideffects and noted that legs felt weaker and had pain and that was me.
Comments: I felt that I was becoming lazy because I couldn't go out to bring in or hang up the washing. Everything was becoming a heavy chore and just to get up in the morning and get dressed and head into the day was a task. This just reinforced my sense of laziness of which that is not a character trait of mine. It has stopped the UTI's but I still suffer with the incontence of which no doctor has ever nbothered to investigate. I feel betrayed by the medical profession as I now have a huge monthly bill to pay for my incontinence pads. I just manage to get through all of this knowing that there are people far worse than me and I find ways to help others now.

Side Effects: I took it for seven days_ caused me some nausea and diarrhea for about one day during the course_ and then I was fine. Got the uti again after sex about 10 days later_ currently back on macrodantin for another 7 days and I have started feeling nauseous again after two days on the treatment. It works to stop the pain of uti's_ but the side effects are awful.
None so far !
Comments: Took first capsule 2 hours ago and already I'm feeling much better. Hope it continues but must say I have my worries after reading peoples comments on here !!!

Side Effects: I was so sick while taking this medicine i couldnt sleep constant nausea_vomiting and headaches i have taken myself off this tablet and going back to the doctor it is dangerous
NO SIDE EFFECTS
Comments: THIS DRUG HAS HAS BEEN A GODSEND FOR ME. IF I TRY TO STOP TAKING IT SYMPTOMS COME STRAIGHT BACK

Side Effects: headache and legs_ flashing lights_ vomiting_ right side lower back pain_ very drowsy etc...
Heavy chest_ chills and really bad headache.
Comments: I would rather of had the infection_ then deal with these side effect_ my chest was so heavy I couldn't even talk as it was taken my breath away_ the chills were just as bad one minute cold the next hot_ two days on I still have a banging head and still feel hot and sweaty. Good news is after taken only 4 tablets the infection is better_ not completely gone_ and still have have 35 pills left.

Side Effects: The only side effects have been severe insomnia despite feeling very tired_ and unusual night sweats.  Also experienced floaters and flashing lights in my right eye which I attributed to posterior vitreous detachment (a common non-pathological event) but having read some of the comments now wonder if it may have been a side-effect.
Comments: Eliminated acute uti quickly_ experienced none of the other problems that other people have complained of_ despite my allergy to penicillin and the fact that many antibiotics do cause me digestive problems.

Side Effects: Lung failure. (DIFFUSE INTERSTITIAL PNEUMONITIS)
Comments: My mother (72yrs) recently died of long term use of this drug. Her lungs failed and it was noted on death certificate asttributed to the macrodantin.

Side Effects: I have been taking this for only 2 days and already have suffered from vomiting_ constant nausea_ stomach bloating/pains_ extreme anxiety and depression_ kidney pain_ bad aches in both legs hips and arms_ dizzy_ no appetite and feel full after small amounts of food.

At first I had naussea and trouble sleeping. I quit on medication three days ago_ and still have the WORST migraine pain I had in my entire life. I have always controlled my migraines with Fioricet_ and taking them now is like I'm having placebo tablets to kill this pain. If I do something that elevates my blood pressure_ or bend my head down I feel like my head is going to explode. I do not  recommend taking this medication_ seriously.
Chills_ aching legs_ sensitive to touch_ cough_ chest heaviness_ total lethargy_ dizzy_ fevers_ right side lower back pain.
scarring of the lungs

I have chronic eosinophilic pneumonia as a result of Macrodantin I took 20 years ago.  It causes recurrent episodes of shortness of breath_ chest pain_ productive cough_ low-grade fever.  I have to take corticosteroids with every exacerbation and am now being placed on them as a maintenance dose.  My lungs are damaged and irreparable.  It is incapacitating when I have symptoms.  Corticosteroids cause problems of their own.

I was in the worst ever pain you could imagine_ and I swear I would have taken anything... Within 1 hour after taking the first tablet_ the burning had halved... By this morning hardly there at all... had diarrhea but seems to have cleared up now. Will keep you updated again soon

i was given macrodantin by the hospital who diagnosed with acuse bladder infection_ within an hour of taking it I had the worst head ache i had ever experienced in my life In fact I thought i was going to die. The doctor told me it was the pill fighting the infection_ but I knew it was the pill. I felt if I took another i would die.The pain left me with a vice like feeling and sensitive head and face for 3 days afterwards. I have since suffered migraines_ and worryingly after reading this and a year later have been back and fore the doctors with numbness. My thoughts are. . try another
Comments: It cleared up the infection almost after one tablet_ I think it was just way too powerful for my system.

Side Effects: Difficulty breathing - even bought ashma pump.  Pains in legs - thought is was associated with recent flu.  Only when rash appeared on arms and legs did I suspect allergic reaction.
Comments: Ceased medication 36 hours ago and all symptoms have disappeared.  I have been prescribed 42 days' medication (one 50 mg capsule per day).  Obviously I will never touch another such tablet.  Thought I had onset of Guillaine Barre syndrome!

Side Effects: MY MOTHER DIED AS A RESULT OF LONG TERM MACRODANTIN DOSE. FEMALE  DOCTOR FOUND TO BE NEGLIGENT BY MEDICAL BOARD AND HEALTH RIGHTS COMMISSION AFTER 4YRS. NO JUSTICE IN THIS WORLD - STILL PRACTISING   AT THE GOLD COAST 19TH AVENUE SURGERY AND STILL ALIVE.
Comments: BEWARE

Side Effects: I took ONE tablet at 15h30.   At 19h30 I suddenly became ill - shivering uncontrollably as if with fever; headache; pains in legs; pains in chest.   Condition worsened quickly - I was finding it very difficult to breathe. Also experienced nausea and vomiting. Cotton mouth - difficulty speaking. Sudden_ heavy phlegm on chest. Was rushed to emergency where I was diagnosed as being in severe anaphalaxis. Antihistamine was administered via IV -  took 2_5 hours to stabilise. Doctor also thought I had bronchitis or early pneumonia - but this is not possible as it came on extremely suddenly.  Later confirmed it was caused by the drug!!
Comments: My doctor was shocked at my reaction to the drug.  He says in all his years of practice_ he has never had a patient show signs of allergy to the drug.

Side Effects: Took one pill of the generic form in evening after dinner.  During the night I felt numbness in my feet and arms/hands which awakened me.  When I awoke I was spinning dizzy and had diffucltiy speaking clearly. I reported to doctor and most effects seemed to have worn off.
Comments: I am very concerned.  I took this many years ago in college and I was fine but lately I have had a few situations where I am hypersensitve to meds.  It's been 2 days and I'm still feeling strange-dizzy again in the morning_ conscioues and aware one eye sees close the other far_ etc.  I am expecting this will all go away but wonder what is in it that causes this quick reaction so that I can avoid it in the future.  Beware if you have sensitivities.

Side Effects: Within 24 hours terible pain in right side of stomach - my firt time on this drug - (usually macrobid with no problem) - so bad my doctor ordered an ultrsound of abdomen on day 4 and found nothing wrong. I ended the drug on day 5.5 not day 7 as ordered_  on advice of my gyno as I was in for my annual  -( drug  was prescribed by my internist)  It has been a week and I am sitll in pain - feeling of fullness after eating tiny amounts - next week I have to go see a gastroenterologist for a scope of the inside of my stomach if pain does not go away after being off the drug for several days. I will never take this drug again but it did stop the UTI symptoms in one day
Comments: The side effects warned of are all about lung problems - the stomach pain on the right side should be investigated. I see others on this site mention right side pain.

Side Effects: Nausea non-stop_ headache_ a feeling of being ill but not sick_ cotton mouth_ 4th day into treatment started feeling deep depression and anxiety. Quit the 7 day treatment half way through day 5.
Comments: Macrodantin cleared symptoms within 24 hours and I had relatively no negative side effects the first few days except headache and nausea. The onset was fast and overwhelming on day 4 though. Would not recommend taking longer than a few days. This is my 2nd day off the medicine and I still have bouts of deep depression and anxiety. Will never take it again.

Side Effects: Non-stop diarrhea and stomach upset.
Comments: I took it about 3PM and by 5:30 my stomach started getting very gassy and painful. By 6:00 I had horrible diarrhea that lasted all night_ and continued into the morning--still waiting for it to go away. I only took that one pill_ but so far every I eat just runs right through me. :( There's no way in hell I'm taking any more.

Side Effects: none
Comments: worked quickly to get rid of pain

Side Effects: severe fever_ chills_ difficulty breathing & pain in chest. Tingling in hands/feet. Severe pain low down in stomach
tingling in hands and feet; sweating; tightness in chest; shortness of breath; coughing; feeling like i was about to die
Comments: Took this drug many times for UTIs with no ill effects (3 day course many times over several years).  The side effects crept up on my slowly each time I took it_ never made the connection.  Until one day -- Boom!   DO NOT TAKE THIS DRUG.  Pharmacist said I had an anaphylactic reaction.  If you even think of taking this drug_ look it up in the PDR first_ it will tell you that chronic use of this drug will cause this type of reaction.

Side Effects: This drug was prescribed to me after exploratory surgery to find out why I was getting recurrent "urinary tract infections" I reacted acutely to this drug. First symptoms: a massive depression within three days_ then the feeling that my body was rapidly shutting down_ almost program by program like a computer about to crash. The hospital emergency unit did not know what was wrong with me - I think they suspected creational drugs! And still I gor sicker. Finally_ by end of day four_ when I felt I was really staring death in the eye_ I suddenly_ in a moment of lucidity clicked that it was the macrodantin.
Comments: Even after a detox fast (lots and lots of water) it still took me almost six months of therapy and acupuncture treatment to finally get back to a normal life.The therapy was to help me deal with the immense anger and sense of betrayal I experienced against the prescribing doctor_ who basically laughed my problems off_ even though I pointed out that the drug was speciffically unsuited to three conditions I had. In fact - I never had a urinary tract infection. I actually had infected kidneys!

Side Effects: none
Comments: pain and frequency gone within 8 hours

Side Effects: Horrible cough and congestion like pneumonia..Severe diarrhea_ abdominal and bladder pain_ numbness in my hands_ arms and legs_ insomnia_ anxiety_ vomiting and headache.
Comments: I'VE NEVER FEEL SO SICK IN MY LIFE!I'VE BEEN TAKING IT FOR 8 DAYS FOR URINARY TRACK INFECTION BUT I'M GETTING WORSE_ LIKE I'M ABOUT TO DIE..THEY SHOULDN'T PRESCRIBE IT!

Side Effects: Peripheral Neuropathy (numbness_ tingling in feet_ nerve pain)_ fatigue_ dizziness_ pains in my sides.  Many times the UTI's came back.  I had a bronchitis type cold when I took this drug this last time and it has taken me longer to get over it than normal.
Comments: I would never recommend this drug to anyone.  I have taken this drug many times in my life_ sometimes a year at a time for UTI's maintenance.  But after this last time_ I noticed that my Peripheral Neuropathy got worse.  I researched my medical records and found that after taken this drug I soon complained of Neuropathy problems and all over pain that the doctor blamed on fibromyalgia.  I think that it was this drug that cause it.  I will never take this drug again!  I also found out that sometimes this drug did not clear up my UTI's and had to be put on a different antibiotic.  Take it from someone that has had many experiences taking this drug; don't take it!

Side Effects: Vomiting_ the beginnings of yellowing of eyewhites_ and huge hives on my legs.  Went to the ER and was told i had the beginnings of liver shutdown. My mother took it and had the same reaction to it.  Neither of us have any other med. allergies.
Comments: I guess our reaction was unusual_ but please be careful if you take it.

Side Effects: Do NOT take this drug. It killed my mother at the age of 66.  Her doctor left her on it for over a year.  It's listed on her death certificate as the cause of death.
None at all.  I had tried two other drugs and neither of the worked.
Comments: I would recommend this for a severe UTI.

Side Effects: none
Comments: didn't feel it really worked. kept on getting UTIs even after having taken it for 6 months straight

Side Effects: loss of appetite_ headache_ body aches_ dry mouth
Comments: I wonder if this antibiotic reacts with methotrexate?

Side Effects: On the 2nd day i had severe bout of diarrhea. Took Immodium_ and diarrhea got better. Now I am experiencing on and off right side/flank pain.
Comments: Only antibiotic that does not keep me awake at night. Took Levaquin for 5 days and could not sleep while taking this medication. Cipro kept me awake too.

Side Effects: severe anaphalaxis..almost death
Comments: this drug is very dangerous

Side Effects: Naseau_ headaches_ very drowsy.
Comments: They should use something else.

Side Effects: Nausea for like_ the first pill. nothing else after that.
Comments: Bactrim helped me a lot. I've heard of so many complaints about people going to the hospital and almost dying cause of this drug_ but i feel that i'm lucky. I was scared about taking them at first cause of a site i looked at. But after the first pill_ i had no side effects.

Side Effects: dizziness_ upset stomach_ and severe pains in the right side
Comments: It worked faster than any other drug I tried before_ but the pain in my side lasted through the whole treatment.

Side Effects: none
Comments: symptoms cleared up in less than a day
